db:abstract.db:para: An example about reading and writing NFC Data Exchange Format (NDEF) messages to NFC Forum Tags.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += nfc widgets requires(qtConfig(filedialog))
TARGET = ndefeditor TEMPLATE = app
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ mainwindow.cpp \ textrecordeditor.cpp \ urirecordeditor.cpp \ mimeimagerecordeditor.cpp
HEADERS += \ mainwindow.h \ textrecordeditor.h \ urirecordeditor.h \ mimeimagerecordeditor.h
FORMS += \ mainwindow.ui \ textrecordeditor.ui \ urirecordeditor.ui \ mimeimagerecordeditor.ui
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/nfc/ndefeditor INSTALLS += target
